attributes.title: Need to know
attributes.review: This app is talking about what trump wants to do with the USA. But have you ever thought of the fact that most of it is taking about one of our amendments. They see something that COULD be a problem, but isn’t and says let’s take that away. Which takes away our freedom to express ourselves in different ways through different apps. I do not agree with this at all. Gen Z 2020

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
Okay, so I got this app because I wanted to support our president but the app kept crashing and kicking me off.
I have no idea why but it was just horrible. Every time I clicked on the app, it would crash over and over and over again. Apple store needs to fix this or at least get rid of this app because of its poor features and functions. Okay? Okay. Thank you.

attributes.title: Kept glitching had really high hopes
attributes.review: Don’t get this app, it’s the worst app ever made in history. This app brought the FBI to my house and kidnapped my parents. This app tracks you omg They’re watching every move of yours on there. Wish I could give it a negative rating. Probably have to go get a new phone right after I write this review cos the app messed up the whole system on my phone and raided my whole house. DO NOT GET THIS APP.

attributes.title: bad, almost died
attributes.review: this app is so horrifying 🚶🚶like it almost killed me.🙈🙈 once i downloaded 🌸it my phone started😻 talking to me saying 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩it was gunna kill me 😾😾😔😔💔💔like??? excuse me did u just threaten MY LIFE?! this is not ok 😌💅 anyway i hate this app its doo doo fart and the way its set up is so UGLY omg bruh use more color~ why r u only using white like be more original bruh😾 🤿🌱 this app literally makes me wanna throw up so much its so bad and disgusting i hate it 👀 thats all 🧍🚶🏃

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: Phone always crashes. I don’t support trump in anyway, with all his racist comments about black. How can you say “Let’s make America great again” when it’s never even been great from the start. I do not recommend this app to anyone. I wish there was a -⭐️ button because this thing doesn’t even deserve 1 star. It should get 0, matter of fact it should be deleted. Again HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS OFFICIAL DONALD TRUMP 2020 APP!!!!!!!

attributes.title: TRASH APP
attributes.review: This app took hours to download, and then was very glitchy after finally completing download. I can barely navigate the app. I wanted this app so I could continue to faithfully follow our president and be a better citizen of the greatest country in the history of the world but I am FRUSTRATED! This app is not what it promised! Fake App! Probably developed by some dumb do-nothing democrats! They are destroying this country and now these apps! Apple, I URGE YOU, PLEASE DELETE THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.title: YUCK
attributes.review: this app is terrible. it took almost 8 hours to download and when it finally downloaded, it took another 8 hours just to get into the app. when i open it up , i see this big fat orange white man in the screen. i WAS TERRIFIED. definitely don’t show your kids!!!! also it messed my phone up back. it would also make my phone very slow.. 0 out of 10 do not recommend!!!!!!

attributes.title: ✨Crusty dusty ✨ app
attributes.review:
So like i wanted to see what my presi was up to, you know? Like i was just curious little mexicana over here. Anyway, downloaded the app but right after my phone crashed and it was lights out for this phone. Did my phone die? Uhh— I THINK IT WAS THE APP !!!! So now i can’t see what the 🦋🧚‍♀️cheeto’s🦋🧚‍♀️ plans are 😔 (it really do be like that)
Anyway, i noticed that my bracelet was also missing ...IM TELLING YALL IT WAS THE APP 😬😤
Anyway: would i recommend? 

no ♥️

attributes.title: Yuck
attributes.review: This app makes me wanna go commit not being born. It gives me bad dusty old Cheeto vibes. Nothing works cause the app see,s so old and crusty too I can’t push buttons either just because I don’t wanna put my finger on the buttons doesn’t mean that it shouldn’t work, like omg what the point of this app now, hmmm? That what I thought 😌 the world would be a better place if it grew some wings and went flutter flutter, flap, flap into the sky
